body_html: @vsuriya93 , yes, I suggest Forward Star (Reverse Star) since you can allocate a continuous memory space before adding edge, if you know the graph size first. You can define your own input pipelines to load data to your graph tensors. You may need a path generator op. Graph is hard to partition, which may limits input size.

body: @vsuriya93 , yes, I suggest Forward Star (Reverse Star) since you can allocate a continuous memory space before adding edge, if you know the graph size first. You can define your own input pipelines to load data to your graph tensors. You may need a path generator op. Graph is hard to partition, which may limits input size.
